# Syntax highlighting

```kt
  @Composable
  fun BottomSheet(modifier: Modifier) {
    val context = LocalContext.current
    Column(
        modifier
            .fillMaxWidth()
            .fillMaxHeight()
    ) {
        Text(text = "Mandatory", style = LocalTypography.current.titleMedium)
        Spacer(modifier = Modifier.height(20.dp))
        ButtonWithSpacer20(buttonText = "Single Button") {
            Navigator.showSheet(context, SheetMandatorySingleButton())
        }
        ButtonWithSpacer20(buttonText = "Two Button") {
            Navigator.showSheet(context, SheetMandatoryTwoButton())
        }
        ButtonWithSpacer20(buttonText = "Text Only") {
            Navigator.showSheet(context, SheetMandatoryTextOnly())
        }
        ButtonWithSpacer20(buttonText = "Confirmation Positive") {
            Navigator.showSheet(context, SheetMandatoryConfirmationPositive())
        }
        ButtonWithSpacer20(buttonText = "With Nav Button") {
            Navigator.showSheet(context, SheetMandatoryWithNavButton())
        }
        Text(
            text = "Optional",
            style = LocalTypography.current.titleMedium,
            modifier = Modifier.padding(top = 20.dp)
        )
        Spacer(modifier = Modifier.height(20.dp))
        ButtonWithSpacer20(buttonText = "Single Button") {
            Navigator.showSheet(context, SheetOptionalSingleButton())
        }
        ButtonWithSpacer20(buttonText = "Two Button") {
            Navigator.showSheet(context, SheetOptionalTwoButton())
        }
        ButtonWithSpacer20(buttonText = "Text Only Without Button") {
            Navigator.showSheet(context, SheetOptionalTextOnlyWithoutButton())
        }
        ButtonWithSpacer20(buttonText = "Confirmation Negative") {
            Navigator.showSheet(context, SheetOptionalConfirmationNegative())
        }
    }
}
```

```xml
<ImageView
    android:id="@+id/ivIcon"
    android:layout_width="16dp"
    android:layout_height="16dp"
    android:layout_marginStart="16dp"
    android:layout_marginEnd="10dp"
    app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="@+id/tvLabel"
    app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
    app:layout_constraintEnd_toStartOf="@id/tvLabel"
    app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="@+id/tvLabel"/>
```
